spec_data.Name: texlive-abstract
spec_data.Description:
The abstract package gives you control over the typesetting of
the abstract environment, and in particular provides for a one
column abstract in a two column paper.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:06:17 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Control the typesetting of the abstract environment
